==History==
*Prior to [[0.31]], the chance to gain -Potion depended on damage dealt.
:Attacks that dealt at least 12% / 5% max HP could prevent you from quaffing potions. Chance increased linearly with damage, up to 50% / 20% damage, where it always happenned. In addition, attacks bringing you below 30% max HP would always give -Potion. Lasts for 1d(damage) turns, maximum 30.
*Prior to [[0.29]], was a 1-rank mutation (equal to level 2 of the current mut), exclusive to [[Ru]].
